project.name: |---- 004-journal
project.description:
The project consist in structuring a journal web page that includes a title, a description and a sequence of three entries of the journal, all of them sharing the same structure: date, an optional image and some text.
Some additional tags are presented such as: q : meant for short quotes that are displayed within the paragraph. It is an inline element, such as em. blockquote : meant for long quotes, that need to be displayed on its own paragraph. It is a block element such as h1, h2, p, etc.
br : Used to add a linebreak. It is an inline element. ol : Ordered lists (It is a block element), with li : for each of the items of the list (It is a block element) ul : Unordered lists (It is a block element), which also uses li for its elements. time : identfies the content as a date and/or time value (inline).
journal.html : The main page for the Journal.
